price: Ili kwa hayo tuihuishe nchi iliyo kufa, na tuwanyweshe wanyama na watu wengi tulio waumba.
arabic: لِّنُحۡـِۧيَ بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗا وَنُسۡقِيَهُۥ مِمَّا خَلَقۡنَآ أَنۡعَٰمٗا وَأَنَاسِيَّ كَثِيرٗا
footnotes: Tunaiteremsha mvua kwa sababu makulima yapate kumea na kukua, na ardhi ipate kufufuka baada ya kufa kwake, na wanyweshwe watu na wanyama walio umbwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: linuḥ'yiya bihi baldatan maytan wanus'qiyahu mimmā khalaqnā anʿāman wa-anāsiyya kathīran
